label: Full-Stack Development
title: Full-Stack Development
description: I develop full-stack web applications, focusing on creating functional, user-friendly experiences that meet business objectives.
points: Developed web applications from concept to deployment, including lead-generation and e-commerce sites.
Built responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented server-side logic and managed databases with PHP and MySQL on a LAMP stack.

label: Cloud & Infrastructure
title: Cloud & Infrastructure
description: I design and manage cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability, reliability, and performance.
points: Provisioned and managed cloud resources on AWS and Google Cloud.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
Monitored system health and performance, ensuring high availability.

label: AI & Automation
title: AI & Automation
description: I leverage AI and automation to streamline processes and create intelligent applications.
points: Developed custom AI models for data analysis and prediction.
Automated repetitive tasks using scripts and modern AI tools.
Integrated third-party AI services to enhance application capabilities.
